SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT v.review_num, v.review_stc_name, v.review_rating, v.review_fixed,
REPLACE(REPLACE(v.review_title,'<','<'),'>','>') review_title,
v.review_hit, v.review_filename, v.review_regdate, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_reply r WHERE r.review_num=v.review_num) v_replyCnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_fav w WHERE w.review_num=v.review_num) v_favCnt, v.mem_num, m.mem_id, m.mem_nick FROM review_board v JOIN member m ON v.mem_num=m.mem_num
ORDER BY v.review_regdate DESC
ORDER BY v.review_hit DESC
ORDER BY v_favCnt DESC, v.review_hit DESC
ORDER BY v_replyCnt DESC, v.review_hit DESC
)a)
WHERE rnum>=#{start} AND rnum<=#{end}
